amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Corps of Engineers Construction by $1 million and reduces funding for Corps of Engineers Expenses by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 8 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for Corps of Engineers Construction by $1 million and to reduce funding for Corps of Engineers Expenses by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murphy (FL) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Murphy (FL) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Murphy (FL).
